Tip_CommonAttributes Characters cannot spend more than 50% of their Karma on Primary Attributes (not including EDG, MAG, and RES). Only one attribute may be at its Maximum value during character creation.
Tip_CommonAttributesBase Base Attribute value.
Tip_OptionsUnarmedSkillImprovements Allows weapons that use the Unarmed Combat skill to benefit from bonuses that apply to unarmed attacks including DV bonuses.
Tip_OptionsIgnoreArt Allows all metamagics, enhancements, enchantments, and rituals to ignore the Art requirement detailed in Street Grimoire.
Tip_OptionsCyberlegMovement Allows characters with two Cyberlegs to use the Cyberlegs Agility to calculate movement rates.
Tip_OptionsDontDoubleQualityRefunds Allows characters in Career mode to remove Negative Qualities at their normal price instead of doubling them.
Tip_OptionsDontDoubleQualityPurchases Allows characters in Career mode to purchase Positive Qualities at their normal price instead of doubling them.
Tip_OptionsExceptionalAttribute Allows Attribute Points to be spent on the bonus point granted by the Exceptional Attributes quality.
Tip_OptionsExceptionalNotMaxed Allows two attributes to be at the metatype maximum rather than one if one of those attributes is improved by Exceptional Attribute.
Tip_OptionsUsePointsOnBrokenGroups Allows Skill Points to be spent on skills belonging to a broken skill group.
Tip_OptionsAllowInitiation Allows Initiation/Submersion using Karma in Create mode.
Tip_OptionStrictSkillGroups Disallow breaking of skill groups with karma during create mode
Tip_CommonAttributesAug Augmented Attribute value.
Tip_CommonAttributesMetatypeLimits Metatype Minimum / Maximum (Augmented Maximum) values.
Tip_CommonNuyen The amount of Nuyen your character has to purchase equipment. 1 Karma = {0}.
Tip_CommonAIRating An A.I.'s Rating is the average of their CHA, INT, LOG, and WIL Attributes.
Tip_CommonAISystem An A.I.'s System is the average of their INT and LOG Attributes.
Tip_CommonAIFirewall An A.I.'s Firewall is the average of their CHA and WIL Attributes.
Tip_CommonAIResponse Response of the Node the A.I. currently resides on.
Tip_CommonAISignal Signal of the Node the A.I. currently resides on.
Tip_CommonContacts Each point of Connection or Loyalty costs {0} Karma.
Tip_CommonEnemies Enemies are the opposite of Contacts. Each Enemy counts towards your Negative Qualities Karma amount.
Tip_CommonBurnEdge Burn a point of Edge
Tip_StreetCred Street Cred is calculated as Career Karma 10, rounded down, and can be further adjusted by Game Masters.
Tip_Notoriety Notoriety is typically gained through Qualities and can be further adjusted by Game Masters. Notoriety can be reduced by 1 point by burning 2 points of Street Cred.
Tip_PublicAwareness Public Awareness is calculated as (Street Cred + Notoriety) 3, rounded down, and can be further adjusted by Game Masters.
Tip_BurnStreetCred Burn 2 points of Street Cred to reduce Notoriety by 1.

Tip_OtherCMPhysical Physical CM is calculated as 8 + (BOD / 2).
Tip_OtherCMStun Stun CM is calculated as 8 + (WIL / 2).
Tip_OtherInitiative Initiative is calculated as REA + INT.
Tip_OtherInitiativePasses Characters have 1 Initiative Pass unless increased through magic or gear.
Tip_OtherMatrixInitiative Matrix Initiative is calculated as Commlink Response + INT.
Tip_OtherMatrixInitiativePasses Characters have 1 Matrix Initiative Pass unless increased through a Cold or Hot Sim.
Tip_OtherAstralInitiative Astral Initiative is calculated as INT x 2.
Tip_OtherAstralInitiativePasses Characters have 3 Astral Initiative Passes.
Tip_OtherArmor Only the highest single Armor value is used to determine your Armor Rating.
Tip_OtherEssence Characters start with 6 Essence which is decreased by adding Cyberware and Bioware.
Tip_OtherNuyen The amount of Nuyen you have left to purchase gear.
Tip_OtherMovement Character's movement speed in meters.
Tip_OtherSwim Character's swimming speed in meters.
Tip_OtherFly Character's flying speed in meters.
Tip_OtherComposure Composure is calculated as WIL + CHA.
Tip_OtherJudgeIntentions Judge Intentions is calculated as INT + CHA.
Tip_OtherLiftAndCarry Lift and Carry is calculated as STR + BOD.
Tip_OtherMemory Memory is calculated as LOG + WIL.
Tip_OtherCareerKarma The amount of Karma the character has accumulated over their career. s
